title: Most valuable sport athlete brands worldwide 2017
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 37.2 is found at Player Roger Federer and the minimum is found at Stephen Curry where Player is 13.4.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Player is 23.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Player Roger Federer and lowest at Player Stephen Curry.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 37.2 is found at Player Roger Federer and the minimum is found at Stephen Curry where Player is 13.4.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Player is 23.8.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Player, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Player on the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Player Roger Federer and lowest at Player Stephen Curry.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars of Player Roger Federer is 2.78% larger than the minimum value at Stephen Curry.
Player Roger Federer is higher than any other Players with value 37.2, followed by LeBron James, and Usain Bolt. Down to Player Stephen Curry with the lowest value 13.4.
The lowest value 13.4 at Stephen Curry is almost 1.77 times smaller than the average value 21.03.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 210.3 if we add up values of all Players.
